price: 7. Nummah asmatah! umá marih kitab baaxok gubal sijjiin deqsita aracay ceya lei yan.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-fujāri lafī sijjīnin
